meta_description: Serving the Christopher Newport community, Hampton Roads and all of Virginia, the Mary M. Torggler Fine Arts Center cultivates extraordinary encounters with the visual arts. Whether viewing an exhibition, taking a class, or attending a lecture or gallery talk, the Torggler beckons you to explore compelling ideas through the transformative lens of visual art.
hours_text:
**All exhibitions at the Mary M. Torggler Fine Arts Center are free and open to the public.**

## Hours

**The Torggler is closed to the public on Mondays and during major holidays.** Those who are enrolled in classes will be able to access the building during the evenings and on weekends when classes are in session.
admission_text:
# Visit

**All exhibitions at the Mary M. Torggler Fine Arts Center are free and open to the public.**

## Hours

**The Torggler is closed to the public on Mondays and during major holidays.** Those who are enrolled in classes will be able to access the building during the evenings and on weekends when classes are in session.

Galleries

**Monday**  
Closed

**Tuesday - Saturday**  
10 a.m. - 5 p.m.

**Sunday**  
12 - 5 p.m.

[Download Map](https://cnu.edu/_images/maps/campus-map-3300x2499.jpg)

## Accessibility

The Torggler is fully accessible on all levels for visitors with mobility challenges. For parents of young children, stroller parking is available on the first floor.

## Parking

Visitor parking is available next to the Torggler in Lot B. Please refer to the campus map below for guidance.

## Events

[All events](https://cal.cnu.edu/torggler/calendar) Back to top

[ Classes The Mary M. Torggler Fine Arts Center offers many opportunities to explore, appreciate and create visual art. We offer a year-round schedule of classes and workshops designed to unleash your inner artist! ](programs/index.html)
